pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions of Service at Elysian Hotel Home Casino Rooms Contact Home Casino Rooms Contact Terms and Conditions 1. Introduction Welcome to Elysian Hotel. By accessing our website and services, you agree to comply with and be bound by the following terms and conditions. 2. Booking and Reservations All bookings are subject to availability and confirmation. Payment details must be provided at the time of booking. Cancellations must be made 24 hours before the check-in date to avoid charges. 3. Check-In and Check-Out Check-in time is from 3:00 PM and check-out time is by 11:00 AM.
